snippet: With a systemic, long-term threat far more apparent in the wake of the so-called Frankenstorm, New York officials are joining a long list of experts and administrators around the world who are seeking to protect their cities from the high waters...
abstract: With a systemic, long-term threat far more apparent in the wake of the so-called Frankenstorm, New York officials are joining a long list of experts and administrators around the world who are seeking to protect their cities from the high waters associated with climate change.

headline.main: How Cities Plan to Keep the Sea at Bay in an Age of Climate Change
